name: Bendy in Nightmare Run
summary:
"Bendy In Nightmare Run™" (BINR) is a mobile boss runner for both Android and iOS. Play as the mischievous Bendy as you swipe to jump, dash and counter-attack four of the largest, nastiest bullies ever depicted in the classic 1930's cartoons of Joey Drew Studios. Collect bacon soups along the way to earn goodies and get ready for new content to come throughout 2018 and beyond. Bendy needs your help to stay out of trouble. 
 
The chase is on!
